grid.title: Sugar Editor
grid.author: Cell Society Team 5
grid.description: This configuration shows a Sugar grid for users to create their own layout. Click on a cell to cycle through its states (White = Open, Yellow = 1 Sugar, Orange = 2 Sugar, Red = 3 Sugar, Blue = Agent). First pause the simulation, change cells to the desired values, save the configuration, then reload the configuration. Now you can reset the simulation any time.
